ARABIC: وَلَقَدِ ٱخْتَرْنَٰهُمْ عَلَىٰ عِلْمٍ عَلَى ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We chose them knowingly above all other people
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And We exalted them over the other people knowingly,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: We knowingly exalted them (i.e., the Children of Israel) above other peoples of the world
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We gave preference to the Israelites over the other people with Our knowledge
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And We knowingly chose them, among all others of their time.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And We chose them above the nations (Al-`Alamin) with knowledge,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And certainly We chose them, having knowledge, above the nations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and We chose them, out of a knowledge, above all beings,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And We chose them, purposely, above (all) creatures.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We knowingly chose them above all other people
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And assuredly We elected them with knowledge above the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Certainly We chose them knowingly above all the nations,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And We chose them aforetime above the nations, knowingly,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And We chose them (the Children of Israel) above the 'Alamin (mankind, and jinns) [during the time of Musa (Moses)] with knowledge,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and We chose them, out of a knowledge above the nations (of their time).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And We chose them knowingly over all other people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We certainly chose them by knowledge over [all] the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [44:32] And verily We chose them, that is, the Children of Israel, with a knowledge, that We had of their state, over [all] the worlds, that is, the worlds of their time, [those of] the rational beings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And We chose them) i.e. the Children of Israel, (purposely) in accordance with Our knowledge, (above (all) creatures) of their time, by bestowing upon them quails and honey, the Scripture and Messenger, and by saving them from Pharaoh and his folk and from drowning.
